page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT } There is a high employment rate in the area.Most of the people are employed or self_employed.Because they live in the countryside alot of the people have agricultural jobs,working on farms,or indirectly connect with farming work. They have to travel between 0_10 miles everyday. Most farmers employ workmen. Everyone who has to travel farther than that would travel by car.Most of the commuters work in Wolverhampton. The main categories of work are professional and agricultural.Which are equally represented in our sample.Clerical and manual make up a smaller percentage.
